servinfo.title: DTC B1042: Passenger Air Bag Initiator Circuit Resistance Low

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC B1041: Passenger Air Bag Initiator Circuit Resistance High .

attention2.ptxt: Be sure to observe instructions under CAUTION in “Air Bag Diagnostic System Check Flow”.

servinfosub.title: DTC Will Set when
servinfosub.ptxt: The combined resistance of the passenger air bag (inflator) module, harness wiring and connector terminal contact is below a specified value for specified time.

ptxt.emph: Step 1: Check if malfunction is in passenger air bag (inflator) module.
Step 2: Check passenger air bag (inflator) module initiator circuit. (Between “G68” and “G65”)
Step 3: Check passenger air bag (inflator) module initiator circuit. (Between “G67” and “G47” or “G67” and “G46”)

test1.ptxt: With ignition switch OFF, disconnect passenger air bag (inflator) module connector.
Check proper connection to passenger air bag (inflator) module at terminals in “G65” connector.
If OK, then connect special tools (A), (B) and (D) to “G65” connector.

testgroup.question: With ignition switch ON, is DTC B1042 indicated?

action.ptxt: Turn ignition switch OFF. Replace passenger air bag (inflator) module referring to Passenger Air Bag (Inflator) Module Removal and Installation .

test1.ptxt: With ignition switch OFF, disconnect “G67” connector located near the glove box.
Check proper connection to instrument panel harness connector at terminal “G67-1” and “G67-2”.
If OK, then connect special tools (B) and (C) to “G67” connector disconnected in Step 1).

testgroup.question: With ignition switch ON, is DTC B1042 indicated?

paragroup.ptxt: “BLU/RED” circuit shorted to “YEL/RED” circuit, “BLU/RED” circuit or “YEL/RED” circuit shorted to other circuit. (Between “G68” and “G65” connectors)

test1.ptxt: With ignition switch OFF, disconnect SDM connector “G47” or “G46”.
Check proper connection to SDM at terminals “G47-3” and “G47-4” or “G46-5” and “G46-6”.
If OK, release shorting bar in SDM connector inserting release tool (1) included in special tool (A).
Measure resistance between “G47-3” and “G47-4” terminals [A] or between “G46-5” and “G46-6” terminals [B] with connected special tools (B) and (C).

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good SDM and recheck.
“BLU/RED” circuit shorted to “YEL/RED” circuit, “BLU/RED” circuit or “YEL/RED” circuit shorted to other circuit. (Between “G67” and “G47” connectors or between “G67” and “G46” connectors).

attention3.ptxt: Upon completion of inspection and repair work, perform the following items.

item.ptxt: Reconnect all air bag system components and ensure all components are properly mounted.
Clear DTCs referring to DTC Clearance , if any.
Repeat Air Bag Diagnostic System Check to confirm that the trouble has been corrected.
